# Autorandr

```nix PereWork/system/autorandr.nix
{ config, pkgs, lib, ... }:
{
  services.autorandr = {
    profiles = {
      "scrivanie" = {
        fingerprint = {
          "DP-3.1.8" = "";
          "DP-3.8" = "";
          DP-4 = "00ffffffffffff0006afed6100000000001a010495221378025925935859932926505400000001010101010101010101010101010101783780b470382e406c30aa0058c1100000180000000f0000000000000000000000000020000000fe0041554f0a202020202020202020000000fe004231353648414e30362e31200a00ea";
        };
        config = let
          common = {
            gamma = "1.099:1.0:0.909";
            # x-prop-non_desktop = 0;
          };
        in {
          "DP-3.1.8" = common // {
            position = "0x0";
            mode = "2560x1440";
            rate = "59.95";
            # crtc = 2;
          };
          "DP-3.8" = common // {
            primary = true;
            position = "2560x0";
            mode = "2560x1440";
            rate = "59.95";
            # crtc = 1;
          };
          DP-4 = common // {
            position = "5120x360";
            mode = "1920x1080";
            rate = "60.05";
            # crtc = 0;
          };
        };
      };
    };
  };

  services.xserver.dpi = 96;
}
```
